verbs.description: Univision senior news anchor Jorge Ramos and [V: retiring] [ARG0: Chicagoland Congressman Luis Gutiérrez] once again teamed up for a master class in racial demagoguery and agenda - driven journalism . This time , in order to make hay out of President Trump ’s “ animals ” remark regarding MS-13 gang members .
